title: 'Seeing the sights' costs man his Lamborghini after being clocked at over double the speed limit
desc: A 51-year-old Surrey man has a pocketful of traffic tickets and no car keys for a week after being stopped for speeding on the Alex Fraser Bridge.

title: The Twelve Dates Of Christmas Casts Penelope Ann Miller, Paul Ben-Victor, More
desc: Rom-com 'The Twelve Dates of Christmas' has brought Penelope Ann Miller, Paul Ben-Victor, Greer Grammer & Kahyun Kim aboard for roles.

title: The Borderline, Bell Media’s big post-Super Bowl push, is bordering on bad
desc: It’s good to see Crave giving Canadian crime a go, but they must be careful not to dilute the increasingly powerful brand

title: Amazon's AI Bet on Anthropic Soars to $61 Billion Valuation
desc: The cloud giant holds convertible notes in Anthropic. As the AI startup raises more money, this debt converts to equity.

title: Felony charge against top NHL prospect Gavin McKenna dropped
desc: Penn State hockey star Gavin McKenna will have his felony aggravated assault charge dropped, the Centre County District Attorney's Office announced Friday.

title: Manchester United are winless against Tottenham in eight matches: Stats
desc: Manchester United take on Tottenham Hotspur in Matchweek 25 of the Premier League 2025-26 season at Old Trafford

title: Farrell to carry out review after Ireland humbled by France in Six Nations
desc: Andy Farrell has insisted Ireland can keep pace with rugby’s top sides after 36-14 defeat by France in Paris

title: From Measurements to Solar Wind Model Initial Conditions
desc: A new method shows how solar wind measurements at Earth can be used to define initial conditions for solar wind models to reduce their need for solar magnetic maps and decrease their uncertainty.

title: Pastors Convicted of Rape
desc: Clergy abuse in South Africa is under scrutiny as pastors are convicted of rape and femicide, highlighting systemic failures within churches.

title: Disney+ loses access to Dolby Vision and HDR10+ in some European countries
desc: Disney+ subscribers in Germany and other countries have lost access to Dolby Vision streaming due to a technical issue, according to Disney.
